EmailTemplate.name: EM-202305-HHS-ENT-STROKE-AWARENESS-MO-Reputation.01 - Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Innovations in telestroke
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Why nearly 1,400 hospitals rely on us As one of the earliest innovators and the global leader in telestroke, we’re proud to provide nearly 1,400 hospitals with life-saving virtual care technology that helps stroke patients achieve better outcomes.
See how our partner Providence St. Joseph Health has been providing regional telestroke services for more than 10 years through a system-wide network powered by Teladoc Health. About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
